We have a benevolent mission.

We have a benevolent mission.

We strive to ensure our communication services truly benefit businesses and the communities they serve.

I started btek because I love working with and helping small businesses, especially those who foster community. Coming from a technical background, I found my interests and skills best align with small businesses in online communications.

Total Leads Generated
___,___

Towards that end, I've focused my entire career around online marketing and website technologies. I leverage my experience and passion to hand-pick and implement technologies which are beautiful inside and out, affordable, easy to use, and boost sales. Think of us as Red Bull for your business.

Here's our 3 step process:

  1. Building you a beautiful, sales-optimized website to guide customers happily down a path to purchasing your product, while at the same time reflecting your brand vision.
  2. Getting your business more attention with custom-tailored search engine optimization, advertising and social media branding.
  3. Continuous improvements based on real-world analytics.

Customers are searching the internet right now for your product and choose competitors because they don't know you exist. Team up now and get found.

Not quite ready? Check out our learning center or join our mailing-list.
